API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.view.BasicView

type
class
extends
flash.display.Sprite
Basic view to simplify Sandy scene setup. You just have to extends it, and call init method with your settings. Right after that you can use some utils methods to improve workflow.
